meanings.definition: To engage in sexual activity with a member of the same sex.
meanings.sent1: She homosexes with her girlfriend every weekend.
meanings.sent2: He homosexes with his boyfriend in private.
meanings.sent3: The couple next door always homosexes loudly, making the neighbors blush.
meanings.sent4: Their love for each other is so strong, it feels like the whole world homosexes with them.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed a beautiful scene where the characters homosexed under the stars.

meanings.definition: A person who is sexually attracted to members of the same sex.
meanings.sent1: My cousin is a homosexes and proud of it.
meanings.sent2: She has many friends who are also homosexes.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of fun and colorful homosexes celebrating love.
meanings.sent4: In a world where everyone is accepted, being a homosexes is just as normal as being straight.
